titleStmt.title: A trumpet of the Lord sounded out of Sion which gives a certaine sound in the eares of all nations and is a true noyse of a fearfull earthquake at hand which shall shake the whole fabrick of the earth ... with a salutation to the seed who are gathered into the fold and with the children of the king ... / by one whose name is truly known by the children of the same birth ... Edward Burrough.
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
